#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
int main()
{
	ll t,a,b,i;
	vector<ll> fib(1000001);
	fib[0]=0;
	fib[1]=1;
	for(i=2;i<=1000000;i++)
		fib[i]=(fib[i-1]+fib[i-2])%mod;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
		printf("%lld\n",fib[__gcd(a,b)]);
	}
	return 0;
}
